title: Topic 001 Question 253
body: Multiple team members are collaborating on infrastructure using Terraform and want to format their Terraform code following standard Terraform-style convention. How could they automatically ensure the code satisfies conventions?
options: Run the terraform fmt command during the code linting phase of your CI/CD process
Manually apply two spaces indentation and align equal sign "=" characters in every Terraform file (*.tf)
Run the terraform validate command prior to executing terraform plan or terraform apply
